Research Log: The Dwarves are gone at last! The Ultimate Golem is triumphant! I only wish I could control it! Does it dare defy me, just because I'm not a giant? What nerve! No one treats the great Dr. Chaos like this! I will tame you, Golem! But there are more urgent matters... There was a terrible explosion in the north wing today! I'm afraid it was a power overload. I didn't touch anything. I must devise a Golem to keep this place under control! I don't have time to deal with Spartacus now... I'll have to start with Wendy...
